title: Track Critical Lease Option Dates
description: A commercial property manager must track and notify tenants of upcoming dates for lease renewal or expansion options.

tasks.description: Abstract all leases to identify and log critical dates, such as the notification deadline for a renewal option.
tasks.expected_outcome: All critical dates are extracted from leases and entered into a tracking system.

tasks.description: Set up automated reminders for the property manager and the tenant well in advance of the critical date.
tasks.expected_outcome: Automated alerts are scheduled in the system.

tasks.description: When an alert is triggered, send a formal notification to the tenant reminding them of their upcoming option deadline.
tasks.expected_outcome: The tenant receives a timely, formal reminder.
